issue.title: [CF 140] Prowl is not displayed by TMW
issue.body:
Hello,

Sorry but my favorite addon TellMeWhen does not works with the druid ability "Prowl" (cat form).

How to prove it?
1. Make a new icon, turn ON them.
2. Chose an icontype "buff", chose a target 'player".
3. Chose a name 'Prowl".

If you activate the Prowl ability (druid cat form), this icon not displayed. But he must. :(
This icon ignores this ability.

version of TellMeWhen: 3.0.4a (official latest from curse, rus).

Thats all.
Plz, answer me about this problem =)

I hope you can understand my ticket, sorry for my bad english language - i am russian :)

Best wishes,
your skilled user.


> Posted by CurseForge user mivulf | Imported from CurseForge issue #140 | Raw
